00037  private $f = false;
00038  
00049  public function readFile($uri, $a = false) {
00050   // all we have to do with this function is setup the input file handle
00051   $this->f = fopen($uri, "r");
00052   if(!$this->f) {
00053    $this->throwError("File could not be opened", array('uri' => $uri));
00054    return false;
00055   }
00056    
00057   // $a must be an array
00058   if(!is_array($a))
00059    $a = array($a => true);
00060   
00061   // skip lines
00062   if(isset($a['skip'])) {
00063    for($i = 0; $i < $a['skip']; ++$i)
00064     $this->readNext();
00065   }
00066   
00067   return true;
00068  }
00069  
00079  public function readString($str, $a = false) {
00080   // assign the string to our internal handle with a trailing line, this is very important
00081   $this->f = "$str\n";
00082   
00083   // $a must be an array
00084   if(!is_array($a))
00085    $a = array($a => true);
00086   
00087   // skip lines
00088   if(isset($a['skip'])) {
00089    for($i = 0; $i < $a['skip']; ++$i)
00090     $this->readNext();
00091   }
00092   
00093   return true;
00094  }

00143  public function unescapeString($str) {
00144   $str = str_replace('\n', "\n", $str);
00145   $str = str_replace('\t', "\t", $str);
00146   $str = str_replace('\r', "\r", $str);
00147   return $str;
00148  }
00149  
00155  public function escapeString($str) {
00156   $str = str_replace("\n", '\n', $str);
00157   $str = str_replace("\t", '\t', $str);
00158   $str = str_replace("\r", '\r', $str);
00159   return $str;
00160  }
00161  
00178  public function readNext($options = false) {
00179   // prechecks
00180   $r = false;
00181   $event = false;
00182   $depth = 0;
00183   $child = new CMVItem("");
00184   if($this->f === false || feof($this->f))
00185    return $r;
00186   
00187   // reading the file one line at a time look for the open
00188   while(!feof($this->f)) {
00189    $line = trim(fgets($this->f));
00190    $pos = strpos($line, ":");
00191    if($pos !== false) {
00192     $key = substr($line, 0, $pos);
00193     $value = substr($line, $pos + 1);
00194    }
00195    
00196    if($line == "BEGIN:VCALENDAR")
00197     $r = new CMVCalendar();
00198    elseif($line == "END:VCALENDAR")
00199     return $r;
00200    elseif($key == "BEGIN") {
00201     if($depth == 0)
00202      $event = new CMVItem($value);
00203     else
00204      $child = new CMVItem($value);
00205     ++$depth;
00206    } elseif($key == "END") {
00207     if($depth == 1)
00208      $r->addItem($event);
00209     else
00210      $event->children[] = $child;
00211     --$depth;
00212    }
00213     
00214    elseif($key == "VERSION")
00215     $r->version = $value;
00216    elseif($key == "PRODID")
00217     $r->prodID = $value;
00218     
00219    else {
00220     $a = explode(";", $key);
00221     $a2 = array();
00222     for($i = 1; $i < count($a); ++$i) {
00223      $item = $a[$i];
00224      $pos = strpos($item, "=");
00225      $a2[substr($item, 0, $pos)] = substr($item, $pos + 1);
00226     }
00227     
00228     $value = $this->unescapeString($value);
00229     if($depth == 1)
00230      $event->addAttribute($a[0], $value, $a2);
00231     else
00232      $child->addAttribute($a[0], $value, $a2);
00233    }
00234   }
00235   
00236   return false;
00237  }

00275  public function prepareWriteFile($uri, $a = false) {
00276   // $a must be an array
00277   if(!is_array($a))
00278    $a = array($a => true);
00279   
00280   // this method only has to open the writing file handle
00281   if(isset($a['append']))
00282    $this->f = fopen($uri, "a+");
00283   else $this->f = fopen($uri, "w");
00284   
00285   if($this->f === false)
00286    return $this->throwWarning("The output file could not be opened", array('uri' => $uri));
00287   
00288   return $this->f !== false;
00289  }
00290  
00302  public function finishWriteFile($a = array()) {
00303   if($this->f !== false)
00304    fclose($this->f);
00305   return true;
00306  }
00307  
00314  private function writeNextItem($it) {
00315   fwrite($this->f, "BEGIN:" . $it->type . "\n");
00316   foreach($it->attr as $k => $vs) {
00317    foreach($vs as $v) {
00318     fwrite($this->f, $k);
00319     foreach($v as $k2 => $v2) {
00320      if($k2 != "VALUE")
00321       fwrite($this->f, ";$k2=$v2");
00322     }
00323     fwrite($this->f, ":" . $this->escapeString($v['VALUE']) . "\n");
00324    }
00325   }
00326    
00327   if(count($it->children) > 0) {
00328    foreach($it->children as $item)
00329     $this->writeNextItem($item);
00330   }
00331     
00332   fwrite($this->f, "END:" . $it->type . "\n");
00333   
00334   return true;
00335  }
00336  
00342  public function writeNext($item = false) {
00343   if($this->f === false)
00344    return false;
00345    
00346   fwrite($this->f, "BEGIN:VCALENDAR\n");
00347   fwrite($this->f, "VERSION:" . $item->version . "\n");
00348   fwrite($this->f, "PRODID:" . $item->prodID . "\n");
00349   
00350   foreach($item->items as $it)
00351    $this->writeNextItem($it);
00352   
00353   fwrite($this->f, "END:VCALENDAR\n");
00354   
00355   return true;
00356  }
00357  
00358 }
